# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

find_package(linux-headers-generic REQUIRED)

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_enum_parser_bin
  TOOL_enum_parser_dependency
  tools/enum_parser/enum_parser
  enum_parser
)

add_library(essentials-public-fastcheck)


target_link_libraries(essentials-public-fastcheck PUBLIC
  linux-headers-generic::linux-headers-generic
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  yql-essentials-ast
  core-services-mounts
  essentials-core-user_data
  udf-service-exception_policy
  yql-essentials-sql
  essentials-sql-pg
  essentials-parser-pg_wrapper
  providers-common-provider
  sql-v1-lexer
  v1-lexer-antlr4
  v1-lexer-antlr4_ansi
  sql-v1-proto_parser
  v1-proto_parser-antlr4
  v1-proto_parser-antlr4_ansi
  sql-v1-format
  essentials-sql-settings
  parser-pg_wrapper-interface
  essentials-sql-v1
  tools-enum_parser-enum_serialization_runtime
)

target_sources(essentials-public-fastcheck PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/public/fastcheck/fastcheck.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/public/fastcheck/linter.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/public/fastcheck/lexer.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/public/fastcheck/parser.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/public/fastcheck/translator.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/public/fastcheck/format.cpp
)


generate_enum_serilization(essentials-public-fastcheck
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/public/fastcheck/linter.h
  INCLUDE_HEADERS
  yql/essentials/public/fastcheck/linter.h
)
